q: How do I add EzPlay to OBS?
a: In Studio, copy the Program URL and add it as a Browser Source in OBS. Use 1920x1080 (or ?res=720 for 1280x720).
Open Studio and copy the latest Program URL with token. If WS is offline, start pnpm dev at repo root first.
Stage mode attempts embed playback when platform policies allow it. Sync mode keeps EzPlay HUD active and opens platform streams in a new tab.
